description:
“The world will not be detroyed by those who are evil...but by those who watch them without doing anything” Einstein.
I’m realizing as I stare upon this platform I have that I need to use it to purpose...and these times are speaking to me to use my voice (I literally created a non profit called platform with a purpose @platformwithapurpose )
So, here I share with you ideas to consider as we navigate through this worldwide event in our lives.
I share pieces from a posts written beautifully by @iammellwells @stephkazolides because they articulate so much of how I feel: “I am not a neurologist or a tech expert, a scientist or a detective but one thing I do have is my voice and my platform. So I have been gathering and sharing everything that feels like reputable truth via my stories—at least to me as I go. [This feels to me, in my heart, as the best thing I can do]
I will share and trust that whatever the truth is will come out. That we will all be awakened.
I trust that light will overcome the dark.
I am not in a battle of debating who is right yet I do stand for freedom of our right to know, our right to speak and our right for justice.
I urge you to find and trust your personal power. To have your own discernment. Your own desire to acquire more knowledge and truth outside of what we are told.
And importantly with whatever unfolds:
Know where you stand about mandatory vaccinations from Bill Gates.
Know how you feel about ID2020/ 2030
Know how you feel about 5g in space.
Know who you feel about event201
Know how you feel about technocracy.
Whatever your positions. I have love for you and I will continue to share my light with you. 
Be blessed
#londonrealarmy #marriedmomandmantras #seekthetruth #thegreatawakening #id2020 
#who #saynotobillgates #nonewnormal
